text: Mario & Sonic at the Olympic Winter Games is a 2009 video game published by Nintendo. It is prior to Mario & Sonic at the Olympic Games released in 2007. Mario & Sonic at the Sochi 2014 Olympic Winter Games followed this game released for the Wii U in 2014. title: Mario & Sonic at the Olympic Winter Games
